citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30-11:00
on 11-Jan-18.
Arrived at facility to find no responsible adult available. Knocked on door of residence, honked horn, and called
available phone number. No contact was made with any designated person.
